description:
She’s always up for a new challenge, and Julianne Moore is considering a role in the third and fourth “Hunger Games” films.

The “Boogie Nights” babe is said to be in “early talks” with the studio and if the deal gets done she’ll play the part of Alma Coin, the leader of District 13.

Ms. Moore would be a welcome addition to the already-stellar cast that includes Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth, and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

Suzanne Collins’ “Mockingjay” novel will be divided into two parts as the final installments of the massively popular franchise, following up “The Hunger Games,” and “The Hunger Games: Catching Fire.”

沪江娱乐快讯：日前有消息透露，由苏珊·柯林斯原著改编的同名青少年冒险科幻电影《饥饿游戏最终篇：自由幻梦》将于9月份在亚特兰大和波士顿开拍。享有独立电影皇后美誉之称的好莱坞女星朱丽安·摩尔很有可能加盟该片。

据了解，狮门影视公司和该片的导演都希望摩尔可以加盟此片。目前双方正在洽谈中，如果成功的话，摩尔将在最终篇中出演奥玛·柯茵这一角色。在小说中，奥玛·柯茵是第十三区反抗军的的头领，拥有一头齐肩的灰发和灰色的眼睛。她讨厌凯妮丝，并提议举办了第七十六届饥饿游戏，但最终被凯妮丝一箭射死。
